title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 July 2014 - XWiki
content:

09:35 <vmassol> good morning  
09:36 <vmassol> does anyone remember where in the code is the place where a doc looses PR when it's saved by a user not having PR right?  
09:37 <vmassol> ah found it  
09:37 <vmassol> doc.setContentAuthorReference(doc.getAuthorReference());

12:51 <vmassol> going to patch xwiki.org  
13:03 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:05 <vmassol> patching myxwiki.org now  
13:05 <cjd> has quit  
13:06 <cjd\_> is now known as <cjd>  
13:12 <vmassol> jenkins job dsl playground: http://job-dsl.herokuapp.com/  
13:12 <vmassol> I have been planning to use that job dsl for a while now  
13:13 <vmassol> that reminds me that I need to find some time to put our CI config under SCM….  
13:13 <vmassol> one option was to generate it from maven, the other is simply to put it under SCM which seems better to me

14:58 <msmeria> has quit  
15:41 <vmassol> tmortagne: shouldn't we close http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1408 as won't fix?  
15:41 <vmassol> or is there a way in the packaging to generate an error if the wrong jdk is used?  
15:41 <tmortagne> vmassol: probably, I want to make sure it's actually working for him first  
15:42 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's not that easy to know what jdk is used  
15:42 <tmortagne> you can't just check the current default jdk  
15:42 <vmassol> yes I guess  
15:42 <vmassol> actually we could check this in our start\_xwiki.sh but that's about it  
15:43 <vmassol> and it wouldn't help for him  
15:43 <tmortagne> that that easy either, right now in Java 6 Tomcat cannot even load XWiki war  
15:43 <tmortagne> s/that that/that's not that/  
15:44 <vmassol> I did that for the bat already  
15:44 <tmortagne> forget that I read too quickly, I tough you wanted to check that in XWiki  
15:44 <vmassol> in any case it's not the main use case so not that useful...  
15:44 <tmortagne> yes whatever is in start\_xwiki.sh is not very useful for real installs  
15:45 <tmortagne> what would be great is declare in the tomcat descriptor that you need Java 7+  
15:45 <tmortagne> then you will then a clear error from tomcat itself  
15:46 <tmortagne> but I doubt that exist (but did not really looked much)
